name: khushmeet-digital-garden
description: Khushmeet's little corner on the internet.

scripts.start: bun run eleventy --serve & bun run npx tailwindcss -i src/tailwind/style.css -c tailwind.config.js -o _site/tailwind/style.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true bun run eleventy & NODE_ENV=production bun run npx tailwindcss -i src/tailwind/style.css -c tailwind.config.js -o _site/tailwind/style.css --minify

author: Khushmeet Singh
